subparts.label: c
subparts.text: There are some coloured cards in a bag. The probability of drawing a red card is 1 and that of drawing a green card is 1 . 5 points are awarded when a red card is drawn and 3 points are awarded when a green card is drawn. No points are awarded when other coloured cards are drawn. After each card is drawn, it is then put back into the bag before the next card is drawn. Charles draws a card at random from the bag. Find the probability that he will not be awarded any points. [1] Charlene draws 2 cards at random from the bag. Find the probability that she will be awarded less than 8 points.
